div.head: Gilding with silver
div.ab: One needs to prepare the guards & whiten them with a li file, a little coarser for than for gold. And one makes them pass beyond grey, as for gilding. And when they are hot, one needs to double the silver foil, then separate it with a knife; next, apply it to the guard with a small tweezers & a small burnisher. And then, reheat & apply until they are all gilt with silver. Next, one needs to cover them for the third time with the doubled foil, as has been said, then burnish them very well & with force, not with the bloodstone but with a strong burnisher. Just as the burnisher ought not to burnish gold.
